channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Car Dealer (Dealership) and Vehicle sales WordPress Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Car Dealer (Dealership) and Vehicle sales WordPress Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-3879|2024-08-03T01:20:58.797Z -- unknown -- car%20dealer%20%28dealership%29%20and%20vehicle%20sales%20wordpress%20plugin
item.description: The Car Dealer (Dealership) and Vehicle sales WordPress Plugin WordPress plugin before 3.05 does not have proper authorisation and CSRF in an AJAX action, allowing any authenticated users, such as subscriber to call it and install and activate arbitrary plugins from wordpress.org
